You obtained a \i[1542]\c[20]Stone Glyph\c[0]!
Weapon Augments are detatchable upgrades for all
weapons. Applying an augment, like the \c[20]Stone Glyph\c[0],
can be done by entering the main menu, going to
the items tab, selecting weapons,
And then selecting the weapon you want to Augment!
Augmenting can add special effects like adding an
element to attacks, adding status effects, or buffing
your characters stats!

You obtained a \i[1544]\c[6]ATK+1 Weapon Scroll\c[0]!
You obtained a \i[1544]\c[6]DEF+1 Armor Scroll\c[0]!
Scrolls are limited use items that directly increase
a weapon or armor's stats. Unlike augmentation, which
can be remove and reapplied, scrolls are destroyed
upon use.
To upgrade a weapon with a scroll, you need to access
the item tab in your main menu, select weapon, and
then, \c[6]Upgrade\c[0]. Upgrading armor is similar
just selecting Armor instead of Weapon.
Note the type of scroll recieved! As an armor scroll
cannot be used on weapons and vice versa!
Note also that weapons and armor have a limit to how
many times they can be upgraded!
